concept.title: SGSN support for independent 2G PRAU and MSRT timers with 3G (Feature f52088-01)
concept.shortdesc: With this feature, 2G PRAU timer can be configured independently from 3G PRAU timer through patch parameters.

conbody.p: When this feature is enabled with the global parameter pRau2g:

ul.li: For 3G PRAU timer, the existing patch parameter paramId 21 is used.
For 2G PRAU timer, a new patch parameter paramId 48 is used.

conbody.p: If the global parameter pRau2g is set to No, the 3G PRAU patch parameter is used, no matter if the new 2G patch parameter is set or not.
If the new 2G patch parameter is not set, the 3G PRAU parameter is used, no matter if the global parameter pRau2g is set to Yes or No.
If neither 2G nor 3G patch parameter is set, the default value 54 minutes is used.
The minimum value for 2G PRAU timer is 54 minutes. And the maximum value for 2G PRAU timer is 180 minutes, which is the same as it is for 3G PRAU timer.
